desc: Shop Green Pepper Herbal Grinder a new disposable Herb Grinder by Grind Lab. It’s store grind & dispense herb, hemp & weed without human touch at best price.

layout.text: Touchless Herb and Hemp Storage and Grinder

Innovating the way consumers store, grind, and dispense Herb Flower and Bud, Grind Lab has created a vertical grinder and storage device similar to a peppercorn grinder that can grind and pour directly into bowls, wraps, etc. without human touch
